title: A Voyage round Great Britain; with short views of Aberdeen, Balmoral, ... Fécamp, Havre and Paris
author: Hargreaves, Thomas
snippet: The coast on the north side of the Forth is closelydotted with villages and large princely mansionsfrom Fifeness up to Burntisland, among othersbeing Macduff Castle, Wemyss Castle, with thevillages of Dysart, Leven, East Wemyss, WestWemyss, Kirkcaldy, &c.
